headline: Trump to hold follow-up call with voters after Nebraska rally for Charles Herbster
author: Aaron Sanderford
sentences: Herbster is in a competitive race for the states Republican nomination for governor with University of Nebraska Regent Jim Pillen and State Sen. Brett Lindstrom headng into Tuesdays primary election.
Four days after hosting more than 3,000 people at a rally in eastern Nebraska, former President Donald Trump is dialing back into the states GOP primary race for governor.
Herbster, in a podcast interview Wednesday with former Trump adviser Steve Bannon, said his internal polling shows him maintaining? a slight lead.
